ing: 2 sashimi-grade ahi tuna steaks, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
des:
"We just returned from a glorious vacation to Maui. Our memories quickly became all the more glorious upon our return to rainy Seattle! 
Now, on a gloomy Saturday afternoon, I have put together this dish to bring a little Hawaii back into our lives and kitchen. You can serve as a salad over finely sliced red and green cabbage (I prefer Napa cabbage)."
ins:
Mix green onion, shallot, soy sauce, lime juice, seaweed, sesame seeds, sesame oil, peanut butter, and chile paste together in a bowl. Add tuna; toss gently to combine.
Cover tuna and chill for 2 hours before serving.
